content:

CONSTRAINTS: You arrive at Marina District at 9:00AM. Stephanie will be at Richmond District from 4:15PM to 9:30PM. You'd like to meet Stephanie for a minimum of 75 minutes. William will be at Union Square from 10:45AM to 5:30PM. You'd like to meet William for a minimum of 45 minutes. Elizabeth will be at Nob Hill from 12:15PM to 3:00PM. You'd like to meet Elizabeth for a minimum of 105 minutes. Joseph will be at Fisherman's Wharf from 12:45PM to 2:00PM. You'd like to meet Joseph for a minimum of 75 minutes. Anthony will be at Golden Gate Park from 1:00PM to 8:30PM. You'd like to meet Anthony for a minimum of 75 minutes. Barbara will be at Embarcadero from 7:15PM to 8:30PM. You'd like to meet Barbara for a minimum of 75 minutes. Carol will be at Financial District from 11:45AM to 4:15PM. You'd like to meet Carol for a minimum of 60 minutes. Sandra will be at North Beach from 10:00AM to 12:30PM. You'd like to meet Sandra for a minimum of 15 minutes. Kenneth will be at Presidio from 9:15PM to 10:15PM. You'd like to meet Kenneth for a minimum of 45 minutes.

Your response should start with 'SOLUTION:'.

Please output the meeting schedule in the following JSON format:
{"itinerary": [{"action": "meet", "person": "<PERSON_NAME>", "start_time": "<HH:MM>", "end_time": "<HH:MM>"}]}. Make sure to include the person's name for each meeting.
